column4: Can't get the DVD .torrent file, all 79,121 bits, to download without error, from http://torrent.ubuntu.com:6969/, link,  http://torrent.ubuntu.com:6969/file?info_hash=%9AAX%C2%90%87%A5%CA%05%D5F%13%EE%E3%DA%7D%A0%17S%18  .
